title: International Community Energy Living Labs
summary: The research aims to create practical solutions for energy communities by examining various international living labs. The project seeks to develop a systematic screening method for fossil-free energy systems, addressing technical, behavioral, regulatory, and legal challenges while prioritizing zero-emission strategies and energy justice.
green_innovation: TRUE. This research project focuses on developing fossil-free energy systems to address environmental sustainability goals and reduce negative environmental externalities.
business_innovation: FALSE. The article primarily discusses research into energy community solutions and not new products or business processes.
green_product: FALSE. The article focuses on developing solutions for energy communities and advancing energy systems, not on a specific green product.
green_process: TRUE. The research aims to develop green processes within energy communities to minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 541714 - Research and Development in Biotechnology, 221119 - Other Electric Power Generation, 541620 - Environmental Consulting Services, 541330 - Engineering Services
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not discuss any false or misleading environmental claims related to products or practices; it focuses on real-world cases and practical solutions for energy communities.
